item.description:
Join Younger Members of the SSDOMG and their Guests for a night of socializing and dining at Great Chow in Abington.  Great Chow primarily serves Chinese cuisine which includes sushi and some healthy options, with Edamame being one of Angela's favorite appetizers.  Let's gather together to break bread with members and guests in their 20's, 30's and 40's on this third Friday in May.

 

There is live enterntainment on the night of our dinner.  Pink Cadillac is scheduled to perform (90's music) in the lounge area beginning around 9:00pm.  For those who want to stay for the entertainment, you are welcome to do so.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Younger Members Dinner (20's/30's/40's)

Friday, May 18th @ 7pm

Great Chow

497 Bedford Street

Abington, MA  02351

781-871-8832

www.great-chow.com

 

Meeting Place: Please meet inside the front door. We may have to wait a few minutes to be seated.

Organizers: Angela & Laura (2012 AM)

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 6 Yes RSVP's by Tuesday, May 15th.  There is currently no maximum.

Guests: One per member.  They must be in their 20's, 30's or 40's.

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Thursday, May 17th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event and are subject to our Group's No-Show Policy.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather: This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information at least 24 hours prior to the event.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions:

Overview: Great chow is located on Route 18 directly across from the entrance to Abington High School.

 

Follow Route 18 (heading south or north).  Great Chow restaurant is located on Route 18 at the intersection of Bedford Street (Route 18) and Lincoln Boulevard, across the way from Abington High School.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Younger Members Dinner (20's/30's/40's)
